mapper.select: SELECT CMT.CHAR_CD ,CMT.CHAR_NM ,CMT.CLASS_CD ,CL.HP ,CL.ATT ,CL.AC ,CL.AV ,CL.XP ,CL.FREQ FROM CHARACTER_MT CMT JOIN CHARACTER_MAP CMP ON CMT.CHAR_CD = CMP.CHAR_CD JOIN CHARACTER_LVL CL ON CMT.LVL = CL.`LEVEL` WHERE CMT.CHAR_CD = #{CHAR_CD}
SELECT 'P' CLASS_CD ,CAST(LVL.`LEVEL` AS CHAR) `LEVEL` ,LVL.HP ,LVL.ATT ,LVL.AC ,LVL.AV ,LVL.REQD_XP FROM CHARACTER_LVL LVL WHERE 1=1
SELECT TYPE ,LINE_TXT FROM CHARACTER_LN WHERE 1=1 AND CHAR_CD = #{CHAR_CD}
SELECT CMT.CHAR_CD ,CL.FREQ FROM CHARACTER_MT CMT JOIN CHARACTER_MAP CMP ON CMT.CHAR_CD = CMP.CHAR_CD JOIN CHARACTER_LVL CL ON CMT.LVL = CL.`LEVEL` WHERE CMP.MAP_CD = #{MAP_CD}

SELECT CM.CHAR_CD ,CM.CHAR_NM ,CM.CLASS_CD ,CC.MP ,CC.MIN_REPL_TERM ,CC.MAX_REPL_TERM ,CC.SP_ABL1 ,CC.SP_ABL2 ,CL.HP ,CL.ATT ,CL.AC ,CL.AV ,CN.LINE_TXT ,CN.TYPE FROM CHARACTER_MT CM JOIN CHARACTER_CMP CC ON CM.CHAR_CD = CC.CHAR_CD JOIN CHARACTER_LVL CL ON CL.`LEVEL` = CM.LVL JOIN CHARACTER_LN CN ON CM.CHAR_CD = CN.CHAR_CD AND CN.`TYPE` = 'A'
